body_html: Thanks Martin, Actually, I am trying to build pytorch/caffe2/mobile/contrib/nnapi/nnapi_test.cc. I found gtest in this file. And the RUN_ALL_TESTS() is in caffe2/test/caffe2_gtest_main. So I think caffe2/test/ folder should be added into cmake. I also tried to turn on BUILD_TEST. but there seems no executable file generated.

So I think caffe2/test/ folder should be added into cmake. I also tried to turn on BUILD_TEST. but there seems no executable file generated.
body: Thanks Martin, Actually, I am trying to build `pytorch/caffe2/mobile/contrib/nnapi/nnapi_test.cc`. I found gtest in this file. And the `RUN_ALL_TESTS()` is in `caffe2/test/caffe2_gtest_main`.  So I think `caffe2/test/` folder should be added into cmake. I also tried to turn on `BUILD_TEST`. but there seems no executable file generated.
